title: 55 Days at Peking 1963 - Charlton Heston & David Niven - The standoff that reshaped Asia

sources.title: 55 Days at Peking 1963 - Charlton Heston & David Niven - The standoff that reshaped Asia
sources.description:
Imperial siege meets international grit! âš”ï¸ When East clashes with West, 400 defenders stand between chaos and the fall of an empire.

1900 Peking: Foreign diplomats and soldiers barricade themselves against the Boxer Rebellion's fury. U.S. Marine Major Matt Lewis and British diplomat Sir Arthur Robertson must outlast 55 days of siege until reinforcements arrive.

Original Title: 55 Days at Peking (1963)
